GapFillInput.Title: Present simple (positive and negative)
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a word from the word pool in each gap.

Content.Question:
Friends Around the World
My name’s Ana and I live in Budapest, the capital city of Hungary. Most people here live in flats with their families but we don't live in a flat. We’ve got a small house with a garden.
I’ve got three brothers but no sisters. My brothers go to school and I study economics and English at university. English is important but most people here don't speak it well.
Most people here start work at nine o’clock in the morning and finish at about five. They don't go home for lunch; they eat in the office or at a café. Then they have a big meal in the evening. Hungarians eat a lot of meat but we don't eat a lot of fish.
